An appendix is an object that only makes sense as a document child. This can be interpreted as appendix not being part of these "first level archetypes" set and delegating its existence to the document context menu.
This has two main problem: - Including appendix archetype in document context menu will require to modify document archetype so it explicitly accepts `appendix` class as child. - It breaks the psychological barrier of the document being the parent of all core/basic archetypes of the current archetype repository.
The first problem is easily fixable, the second problem is more a conceptual decision that a problem itself.
